SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Administrator
An Administrator class, a subclass of Staff
AppointmentCSVHandler
A CSVHandler object meant to write and read from appointments.csv
AppointmentManager
A Manager object meant to handle any appointment scheduling
AppointmentOutcomeRecord
An object meant to store vital information of the appointment outcome
AppointmentSlot
AppointmentSlot meant to contain important information of every appointment
AppointmentStatus
Enumerator containing possible status of AppointmentSlots Pending - Patient Scheduled with Doctor, pending Doctor's approval Confirmed - Doctor accepted Patient request Cancelled - Doctor rejected Patient request Completed - Doctor has conducted appointment and completed Appointment Outcome Record Available - Free slots for patient to schedule with doctor Unavailable - Doctor has marked slot as unavailable
BillingSystem
A BillingSystem Class that singlehandedly manages all Bill related functions
CSVHandler
An Interface for all CSVHandlers to implement
Doctor
A Doctor class, a subclass of Staff
InputValidator
A utility class for validating and obtaining user input from the console.
InventoryCSVHandler
Handles CSV file operations for managing inventory data, including reading and writing medication data and replenishment requests.
InventoryManager
Manages the inventory of medications by performing various operations such as adding, removing, updating, and viewing medications.
Login
Handles the login process for the Hospital Management System, including user authentication, password validation, and initialization of data for patients, staff, medicines, and appointments.
Manager
An Interface for all Managers to implement
MedicalRecord
Represents the medical record of a patient, containing details such as personal information, contact details, blood type, and history of diagnoses and treatments.
Medication
Represents a medication in the inventory system, including its name, stock level, low stock threshold, and a low stock alert status.
Patient
Represents a patient in the hospital management system, inheriting from the User class.
PatientManager
Manages operations related to patients in the hospital management system, including adding new patients, updating patient records, and interacting with the CSV file for data persistence.
PatientManagerCSVHandler
The PatientManagerCSVHandler class handles the reading and writing of patient data from and to a CSV file.
PatientRegistration
The Patient Registration class handles the registration of a new patient Through command-line inputs, it creates a Patient class and updates PatientManager to update PatientRecords in the Hospital Management System
Pharmacist
The Pharmacist class represents a pharmacist in the hospital system.
Prescription
The Prescription class represents a prescription for a specific medication.
PrescriptionStatus
Enumerator containing possible status of Prescription Pending - Doctor prescribed medication, pending Pharmacist approval Dispensed - Pharmacist Approved Prescription Request
Staff
The Staff class is a subclass of User that represents staff members in a hospital system.
StaffCSVHandler
A CSVHandler object meant to write and read from Staff_List_Copy.csv
StaffManager
A Manager object meant to handle any update to staff details
TypeOfService
Enumerator containing possible Types of Service Consultation X-Ray Blood Test
User
The User class represents a generic user in a hospital management system.
